meanings.definition: Excessively or affectedly quaint, pretty, or sentimental.
meanings.sent1: The twee little cottage had flowers painted on its walls.
meanings.sent2: She wore a twee dress with tiny flowers all over it.
meanings.sent3: The twee teapot sang a sweet song as it poured tea.
meanings.sent4: Her twee smile was like a delicate flower blooming.
meanings.sent5: The twee garden was a fairy tale come to life.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is excessively quaint, pretty, or sentimental.
meanings.sent1: The shop was full of twee, with dolls and lace everywhere.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the queen of twee in the small town.
meanings.sent3: The twee of the old clock made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His room was a museum of twee, filled with vintage treasures.
meanings.sent5: The twee of the music box brought back memories of childhood.
